                       java.lang.String message,

        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        message - data to be sent
        isMulticast - true if message is to be sent to all group users

        Reconstructs UDPLib message from received frame.
        Parameters:
        encryptor - Encryptor of sending thread
        source - received packet containing info about true length of datagram

        Overrides:
        getStringMessage in class ADatagram
        Returns:
